description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar and the Deadly Tomb is a hardcore vertical-scroller where you need to escape from an ancient tomb which turned out to be a deadly trap. Run as fast as you can, there is no time to wait! Only the best are able to beat this game!
